mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT favorite_user_id, user_id FROM users_favorites WHERE favorite_user_id = #{favoriteUserId} AND user_id = #{userId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users_favorites (favorite_user_id, user_id) VALUES (#{favoriteUserId}, #{userId}) ON CONFLICT (favorite_user_id, user_id) DO NOTHING
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM users_favorites WHERE favorite_user_id = #{favoriteUserId} AND user_id = #{userId}
